title: NEW VLADIMIR SPLASHES FOR COUNT AND MARQUIS
body:
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/81a719304ea264d5104428fe034e07e40096c3ce8577442a9a75b542ad35a0c1.jpg

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/fb748ef274b9971f998da5f74a0661515130037cd31f79d6bba7882a277c0060.jpg

**REAV3 PLEASE TELL ME MORE ARE ON THE WAY**

http://i.imgur.com/NUyttbn.gif

replies.body:
Please give me a sexy ass Punk Vlad with his Vandal skin.
Just like David from the Lost Boys movie!
Real talk. Vandal Twitch is shaping up to be my favorite splash in the game.
You're a real tease, you know that? XD
As someone who has started maining Twitch and was lucky enough to receive this skin in a chest, this is music to my ears.

**Now you've got me hyped.**

And I don't even play Twitch.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4wQJcwmc,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-10-10T20:59:06.660+0000)
>
> **Now you've got me hyped.**
> 
> And I don't even play Twitch.

I too am really looking forward to what Riot comes up with. Their splash art teams are _phenominal_. The artwork they are doing is really fantastic, and we're getting so much of it. Looking back on it, it's unbelievable how much they have done.

Since the beginning of the splash art update project, they have updated: 

[Frosted Ezreal](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Ezreal_3.jpg?v=520-1), [Assassin Master Yi](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/MasterYi_1.jpg?v=520-1), [Chosen Master Yi](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/MasterYi_2.jpg?v=520-1), [Vandal Brand](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Brand_2.jpg?v=520-1), and [Jade Dragon Wukong](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/MonkeyKing_3.jpg?v=520-1) in Patch 5.20
[Poppy](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Poppy_0.jpg), [Noxus Poppy](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Poppy_1.jpg), [Lollipoppy](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Poppy_2.jpg), [Blacksmith Poppy](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Poppy_3.jpg), [Ragdoll Poppy](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Poppy_4.jpg), [Battle Regalia Poppy](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Poppy_5.jpg), and [Scarlet Hammer Poppy](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Poppy_6.jpg) in 5.24
[Frozen Shen](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Shen_1.jpg), [Yellow Jacket Shen](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Shen_2.jpg), [Surgeon Shen](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Shen_3.jpg), [Bloodmoon Shen](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Shen_4.jpg), and [Warlord Shen](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Shen_5.jpg) in 6.2
[Darius](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/Darius_0.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Evelynn](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/Evelynn_0.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Fiddlesticks](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/FiddleSticks_0.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Kennen](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/Kennen_0.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Blade Mistress Morgana](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/Morgana_3.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Rammus](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/Rammus_0.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Galactic Renekton](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/Renekton_1.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Swain](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/Swain_0.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Warwick](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/Warwick_0.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Tundra Hunter Warwick](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/Warwick_4.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Viscero Xin Zhao](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/pn68/XinZhao_3.jpg?v=1&resize=1024:), [Taric](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/pages/2016/march/tre/img/Taric_Base_Splash_Wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), [Emerald Taric](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/pages/2016/march/tre/img/Taric_Emerald_Splash_Wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), [Armor of the Fifth Age Taric](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/pages/2016/march/tre/img/Taric_FifthAge_Splash_Wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), and [Bloodstone Taric](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/pages/2016/march/tre/img/Taric_Bloodstone_Splash_Wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:) in Patch 6.8
[UFO Corki](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Corki_1.jpg&resize=1024:), [Glacial Olaf](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Olaf_2.jpg&resize=1024:), [PAX Sivir](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/april/msm/img/Sivir_5.jpg&resize=1024:), [Lil' Slugger Trundle](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Trundle_1.jpg&resize=1024:), [Junkyard Trundle](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Trundle_2.jpg&resize=1024:), [Traditional Trundle](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Trundle_3.jpg&resize=1024:), and [Malzahar](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Malzahar_0.jpg) in 6.9
[Buccaneer Tristana](http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/may/pn610/Tristana_5.jpg), [Earnest Elf Tristana](http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/may/pn610/Tristana_2.jpg), [Firefighter Tristana](http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/may/pn610/Tristana_3.jpg), [Guerilla Tristana](http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/may/pn610/Tristana_4.jpg), [Riot Girl Tristana](http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/may/pn610/Tristana_1.jpg), and [Rocket Girl Tristana](http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2016/may/pn610/Tristana_6.jpg) in 6.10
[Bewitiching Nidalee](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Nidalee_5.jpg), [French Maid Nidalee](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Nidalee_3.jpg), [Leopard Nidalee](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Nidalee_2.jpg), [Pharoah Nidalee](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Nidalee_4.jpg), and [Snow Bunny Nidalee](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Nidalee_1.jpg) in 6.11
[Ryze](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2016/june/ryze/img/ryze-splash-1-wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), [Young Ryze](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2016/june/ryze/img/ryze-splash-2-wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), [Tribal Ryze](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2016/june/ryze/img/ryze-splash-3-wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), [Uncle Ryze](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2016/june/ryze/img/ryze-splash-4-wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), [Triumphant Ryze](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2016/june/ryze/img/ryze-splash-5-wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), [Professor Ryze](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2016/june/ryze/img/ryze-splash-6-wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), [Zombie Ryze](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2016/june/ryze/img/ryze-splash-7-wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), [Dark Crystal Ryze](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2016/june/ryze/img/ryze-splash-8-wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:), and [Pirate Ryze](http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2016/june/ryze/img/ryze-splash-9-wallpaper.jpg&resize=1024:) in 6.14
[Prestigious LeBlanc](https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/july/pn615/Leblanc_2.jpg) and [Spellthief Lux](https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/july/pn615/Lux_2.jpg) in 6.15
[Barbarian Sion](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Sion_2.jpg?v=1), [Hextech Sion](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Sion_1.jpg?v=1), [Lumberjack Sion](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Sion_3.jpg?v=1), and [Warmonger Sion](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Sion_4.jpg?v=1) in 6.17
[Yorick](https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/september/pn618/Yorick_0.jpg), [Undertaker Yorick](https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/september/pn618/Yorick_1.jpg), and [Pentakill Yorick](https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/september/pn618/Yorick_2.jpg) in 6.18
[Nightraven Fiora](https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/september/pn619/Fiora_Splash_2.jpg), [Royal Guard Fiora](https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/september/pn619/Fiora_Splash_1.jpg), and [Cottontail Teemo](https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/september/pn619/Teemo_Splash_5.jpg) in 6.19

Most are absolutely stunning, and I think most can agree that all of them are at least improvements over the originals. I think that's so awesome. And those are just the redone splashes; they've been coming up with so many amazing new skin splashes as well!

Hmmm, I think you are forgetting that the splash art update team also works on the splash art for our new VGUs. The first project was actually Poppy's splashes.

You are missing splash updates for Poppy, Shen, Taric, Ryze and Yorick.

 I wonder what the total number is from Poppy until today?

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4wQJcwmc,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-12T14:28:07.832+0000)
>
> Hmmm, I think you are forgetting that the splash art update team also works on the splash art for our new VGUs. The first project was actually Poppy's splashes.
> 
> You are missing splash updates for Poppy, Shen, Taric, Ryze and Yorick.
> 
>  I wonder what the total number is from Poppy until today?

Yep, I forgot about those too, thanks! Added.

Looks like seventy-one redone splashes unless I counted wrong!

*Playing a game with Tides of Blood when suddenly...*

''New Vlad splashes btw, I'm playing one handed.''
-Tides of Blood
That's the Tides we all know and love :9
Blood isnt the only bodily fluid I exhume in tides.
um ok
Must be referring to joyous tears ;D
Sorry there arn't more Vlad coming. We may get to the rest of his splashes one day but that would be much later
Weird Question but is Lord Mordekaiser going to get updated or do we have to wait for his VGU?^^
His splashes will get updated with his VGU
Will they be fabulous?
I can't imagine why not.

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/sonicfanon/images/2/2a/Absol-utely.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20130303191412
http://www.picgifs.com/glitter-gifs/b/beautiful/picgifs-beautiful-743134.jpg
A better question is: Who's splashes will never get updated?
Mine
Is it true that Twitch is next and Karma is after? I'm especially excited for Karma.
That's the current plan, yes. Karma's will likely be awhile though since Warwick has so many skins and we aren't going to start on her until after WW.
Warwick should be coming out soon, yes? Do you think he'll be out before the next champion?
Things can always change of course, but as of now Warwick should be out after the next new champ. Assassins is the project that will be before the next new champ

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4wQJcwmc,comment-id=00080003000000010000,timestamp=2016-10-10T23:26:48.404+0000)
>
> Things can always change of course, but as of now Warwick should be out after the next new champ. Assassins is the project that will be before the next new champ

so after assasins is a new champion and then warwick , so warwick around patch 7.4 ....i can wait, i mean , i waited for 3 years so far , a month wont do anything to stop my hype {{champion:19}}
I've been wondering - are you planning on updating some of Annie's splashes in the near future, or are you happy with her Chinese artwork for now?
Annie is on our list, yes
GP aswell, right? c:
Yes, of course. GP was a full VGU
What about Nasus?
Nasus is on the list too
source?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/6oIxvlAE-skin-splash-art-update

this list is confirmed by Reav3
How long does it take to create one splash and approx. how many hours of work?
There as a ASK Riot about this a couple weeks back. It takes roughly 4-6 weeks

Will you consider moving away from the "class" reworks, and look at updating champions that are related lorewise

eg

Ninja's rework(Shen, Ken, Akali) along with sick ninja lore. 
Order and Chaos: VGU of Morg and Kayle. They need the love visually, and kayle's a lil old now. 

Also theres a category of champs in the healtyh/balanced playstyle, but old af textures/models. What is your stratergy for those champs. 

EG: {{champion:31}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:19}} 

Have a good one pal, lets talk about something cool next time
Maybe one day but for now it makes much more sense to focus on a single class so that the team is focusing on the same problems and the updates can be paired with needed item/system changes.
You guys scrapped that new Irelia base splash art? :(

I think I already asked this in one of my other comments but I can't fully recall, so I apologize if I'm repeating myself. Do you know whether (akin to the Nidalee and Shen splash art updates) Count Vladimir will reappear in the store for a time?

Currently there aren't plans to take these out of the vault temporarily since all his splashes weren't updated so it's not as big of a event. You can get them through hex tech crafting though as well as times we temporarily open the vault.

Is there a reason Black Alistar will never be available again?

And are you aware that out of 600-700ish skins, over 200 aren't available unless you do hextech?
Black Alistar was part of the Digital Pre-Order Edition back in 2009
Yep and is no longer available and has no signs of ever being available again.
It will still get a new splash art tho

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4wQJcwmc,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-10-10T21:09:50.818+0000)
>
> Sorry there arn't more Vlad coming. We may get to the rest of his splashes one day but that would be much later

Why wouldn't the priority be updating his classic splash art? Nidalee got all of her skins updated except for her classic one. Is Riot trying to incentive people to buy skins more if they can't stand the outdated classic splashes?
Vlads base splash is amazing. Why would we need to update it?

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4wQJcwmc,comment-id=0008000b0000,timestamp=2016-10-15T21:52:31.325+0000)
>
> Vlads base splash is amazing. Why would we need to update it?

Because the new splashes are of significantly better quality

There is just something about sitting that make me love these new splash art.
